translation.en: God himself commands you,
depart from the body of Hannah Grace, you demon,
translation.it: ...di abbandonare il corpo di Hannah Grace, o demone...

translation.en: along with every satanic power of the enemy,
translation.it: ...assieme a tutti i poteri satanici del nemico...

translation.en: along with every specter from hell.
Stop!
Hannah, I know you're in there.
translation.it: Hannah, lo so che sei lì dentro.

translation.en: You have to fight, baby.
Fight it, Hannah.
Fight it. Fight it, Hannah.
[SOBBING] You have to fight.
Baby, it's me.
Dad. Daddy's here, baby.
Dad. Honey. Baby.
Dad.
[STUTTERING] You have to fight.
In the name of the Father, in the name of the Son,
translation.it: Nel nome del Padre, del Figlio...

translation.en: in the name of the Holy Spirit.
Hannah, stop!
DEMON: Your whore daughter is mine.
translation.it: La puttana di tua figlia è mia.

translation.en: She's mine forever.
Forgive me.
LISA [ON VOICE MAIL]: Meg. Hey, it's Lisa. I just talked to Dr. Lewis
translation.it: Meg. Ciao, sono Lisa. Ho appena parlato col dottor Lewis e sei a posto...

translation.en: and you're good to go, so maybe you can
translation.it: Meg. Ciao, sono Lisa. Ho appena parlato col dottor Lewis e sei a posto... ...quindi magari puoi passare oggi pomeriggio. Okay, ciao.

translation.en: come in this afternoon. Okay, bye.
translation.it: ...quindi magari puoi passare oggi pomeriggio. Okay, ciao.

translation.en: Hey.
You look nervous. Are you okay?
It's a job interview. I think I'm supposed to be nervous.
translation.it: È un colloquio di lavoro. È normale che sia agitata.

translation.en: Okay. Come on, let's go get a coffee.
translation.it: Vieni, andiamo a prenderci un caffè.

translation.en: LISA: This will be good.
We'll go to meetings in the morning after our shifts end
translation.it: La mattina andremo agli incontri dopo il nostro turno e...

translation.en: and I'll be three floors up, so if you need anything...
translation.it: ...io sarò tre piani di sopra, quindi se ti servirà qualcosa...

translation.en: You know?
Thank you for this.
Don't thank me yet. You still have to meet Dr. Lewis.
translation.it: Aspetta a ringraziarmi. Devi ancora conoscere il dottor Lewis.

translation.en: DR. LEWIS: This job is not for everyone.
translation.it: Questo lavoro non è per tutti.

translation.en: We've had three overnight intake assistants in the last six months alone.
translation.it: Solo negli ultimi sei mesi abbiamo avuto tre addetti all'accettazione notturna.

translation.en: Because of the hours?
No, because it's a thankless, solitary position.
translation.it: No, perché è un lavoro ingrato e solitario.

translation.en: The smell. You never get used to the smell.
translation.it: L'odore. Non ti abitui mai all'odore.

translation.en: I was a cop. I'm totally used to bad smells.
translation.it: Ho fatto lo sbirro. Sono abituata ai cattivi odori.

translation.en: Lisa mentioned that there were issues.
translation.it: Lisa mi ha detto che hai avuto dei problemi.

translation.en: Yes. There were issues. But I'm much better now.
translation.it: Sì. Ho avuto dei problemi. Ma ora sto molto meglio.

translation.en: Well, she assured me that you could handle the job.
translation.it: Mi ha assicurato che riuscirai a gestire il lavoro.

translation.en: Is it something you think you can handle? I can handle it.
translation.it: - È qualcosa che credi di saper gestire? - Assolutamente.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Going down.
It gets to you after a while, being here. People get creeped out.
translation.it: Ti segna, dopo un po' che sei qui. La gente si inquieta.

translation.en: Before you know it, their imaginations are running wild,
they're hearing things go bump in the night.
translation.it: ...e si sentono strani rumori di notte.

translation.en: Not me.
I believe when you die, you die.
translation.it: Per me quando si muore, si muore.

translation.en: End of story.
Good.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
At night, you can't get in or out without swiping this card.
translation.it: Di notte, non puoi né entrare né uscire senza strisciare questo tesserino.

translation.en: If you lose it, hospital security has to let you in. They will not be happy.
translation.it: Se lo perdi, dovrà aprirti la Sicurezza dell'ospedale. Non saranno contenti.

translation.en: Most of the lights are on a sensor. The rest you have to switch on manually.
translation.it: Gran parte delle luci sono a sensore. Le altre devi accenderle manualmente.

translation.en: There are a lot of files that need to be entered into the system.
translation.it: Ci sono molti fascicoli da inserire nel sistema.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind data entry. No, not at all.
translation.it: - Spero non ti dispiaccia inserire dati. - Nient'affatto.

translation.en: Men's room is down there, women's room is down there,
translation.it: Il bagno degli uomini è di là, quello delle donne di là...

translation.en: and down there to the left is the incinerator room for cremation.
translation.it: ...e laggiù a sinistra c'è l'inceneritore per le cremazioni.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
DR. LEWIS: This intake bay is for drop-offs only.
translation.it: La sala accettazioni è solo per lo scarico.

translation.en: No drop-off, no access.
translation.it: Se non scaricano, non si entra.

translation.en: And you never leave the premises while you're on duty. No exceptions.
translation.it: Non lasciare mai la struttura mentre sei in servizio. Nessuna eccezione.

translation.en: [CHIMES] COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Well, you bring the cadaver up from the intake bay,
translation.it: Porti il cadavere dalla sala accettazioni...

translation.en: and take it into the receiving room, which is over here.
translation.it: ...nella stanza ricevimento, che è da questa parte.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Image captured.
First you take an overview of the body and then close-ups
translation.it: Prima scatti una panoramica del corpo, poi primi piani...

translation.en: of each individual injury.
COMPUTER: Image captured. All right, you try.
Rigor mortis makes a corpse difficult to fingerprint.
translation.it: Il rigor mortis rende difficoltosa la rilevazione delle impronte digitali.

translation.en: Now, if you press on the knuckle, it will extend
translation.it: Una pressione sulle nocche farà allungare il dito...

translation.en: the finger, and make it easier to handle.
Gently roll.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
This doohickey sends the prints to a crime database.
translation.it: Questo aggeggio invia le impronte a un casellario.

translation.en: Green means they're ready to go. Red means they're not.
translation.it: Verde significa che possono andare. Rosso significa di no.

translation.en: Yeah.
Green...
Green means go.
Thanks, Moe. You bet, Doc.
The shift starts tomorrow night at 11, goes to 7 in the morning.
translation.it: Il turno inizia domani sera alle 23:00, fino alle 7:00 del mattino.

translation.en: Any problems with that? Not at all.
Well, thank you for the opportunity.
I promise you won't be disappointed.
Welcome to the team.
Thanks.
Hey, do you need to see my I.D.?
translation.it: Ehi, devi vedere la mia tessera?

translation.en: Do you work here? In the morgue. I'm Megan.
translation.it: - Lavori qui? - In obitorio. Mi chiamo Megan.

translation.en: Then no.
Hey, I'm Dave.
Megan. Nice to meet you.
And, you know, welcome to the graveyard shift.
translation.it: E benvenuta al turno di notte.

translation.en: Thanks.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Who are you? Where's Larry?
translation.it: E tu chi sei? Dov'è Larry?

translation.en: I don't know who Larry is, but I'm Megan.
translation.it: Non so chi sia Larry, ma io sono Megan.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue.
You've got to be the right kind to stomach a job like this.
translation.it: Devi essere portata per digerire un lavoro così.

translation.en: Personally...
I'm not what you'd call a people person.
Dead's the way I like them.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
Green means go.
Hey. [GASPS]
Goddamn it, Dave. Sorry.
Not funny.
I didn't mean to. I honestly just came down to check on you.
translation.it: Non l'ho fatto apposta. Sono venuto a vedere come stavi.

translation.en: Shit. I feel like an asshole. Forgive me?
translation.it: Merda. Mi sento uno stronzo. Mi perdoni?

translation.en: I'll never do it again.
Really not funny.
Hey.
MAN 1: Why didn't you shoot me? MAN 2: Megan, do something.
translation.it: - Perché non mi hai sparato? - Megan, fai qualcosa.

translation.en: MEGAN: I don't know what triggers it, really.
A lot of things, I guess.
But I still have nightmares of what happened.
translation.it: Ma ho sempre degli incubi su quanto è successo.

translation.en: Put your hands up!
Me just...
standing there...
doing nothing.
I just freeze up and I can't move.
translation.it: Sono bloccata e non riesco a muovermi.

translation.en: MAN [ON RADIO]: Officer down. Officer down.
translation.it: Agente a terra. Agente a terra.

translation.en: It's okay. I've got you. I've got you.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Ci sono io. Ci sono io.

translation.en: I want it so bad sometimes.
translation.it: A volte li voglio davvero tanto.

translation.en: The drink and the pills, I want them so bad.
translation.it: L'alcol e le pasticche, li voglio davvero tanto.

translation.en: Thank you, Megan, for sharing.
MAN: Hey.
I just, um, need the rest of my stuff.
translation.it: Mi serve il resto delle mie cose.

translation.en: My shift just ended, but if this is a bad time...
translation.it: Sono appena smontato, ma se è un brutto momento...

translation.en: No. No, come in.
And you're still in your pajamas because...?
translation.it: E sei ancora in pigiama perché...?

translation.en: I started a new job last night. A night job.
translation.it: Ieri notte ho iniziato un nuovo lavoro. Un lavoro notturno.

translation.en: That's great.
Doing what?
Overnight intake assistant at the morgue.
It's better than it sounds.
Yeah, I'm basically running the place at night, all on my own.
translation.it: In pratica, gestisco tutto da sola di notte.

translation.en: Are you sure that's a good idea, you know...
translation.it: Sicura che sia una buona idea, insomma...

translation.en: spending so much time alone right now?
Actually, I do. You know, it keeps me from going out at night
translation.it: In realtà, sì. M'impedisce di uscire la sera...

translation.en: doing things I might regret in the morning.
translation.it: ...e fare cose di cui mi pento la mattina.

translation.en: It worked for Lisa and she thinks it could work for me, too.
translation.it: Per Lisa ha funzionato, e pensa che possa funzionare anche per me.

translation.en: "Lisa"? My AA sponsor.
translation.it: - "Lisa"? - Il mio sponsor agli Alcolisti Anonimi.

translation.en: The nurse at the hospital.
She says it keeps her out of trouble working the night shift.
translation.it: Dice che lavorare di notte la tiene lontana dai guai.

translation.en: So, when a job opened up at the morgue, she thought of me.
translation.it: Quando s'è liberato un posto all'obitorio, ha pensato a me.

translation.en: Yeah, still, too much time alone is never good for anyone.
translation.it: Sì, però passare tanto tempo da soli non va mai bene per nessuno.

translation.en: Says the guy who moved out.
translation.it: Parla quello che se n'è andato.

translation.en: You didn't give me much of a choice.
translation.it: Non mi hai dato molta scelta.

translation.en: That's not true, Andrew. You know that's not true.
translation.it: Non è vero, Andrew. Lo sai che non è vero.

translation.en: Since when are you concerned about the truth?
translation.it: Da quando ti preoccupa la verità?

translation.en: I didn't come to...
I should go.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
I forgot my key. Could you open the door?
translation.it: Ho dimenticato la chiave. Potresti aprirmi la porta?

translation.en: You don't work here.
Yes, I do. Just let me in.
Sir, back away from the door. No. No. No.
translation.it: - Signore, s'allontani dalla porta. - No. No. No.

translation.en: Sir. Let me in!
I'm going to call security. Back away from the door.
translation.it: Chiamo la Sicurezza. Stia lontano dalla porta.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue. MAN: Let me in!
Let me in!
MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
Hey, I had a homeless guy at the intake bay.
translation.it: Ehi, c'era un senzatetto alla sala accettazioni.

translation.en: MAN: Thanks for the heads-up. Yeah, we get that a lot.
translation.it: Grazie per l'avviso. Sì, succede spesso.

translation.en: Yeah.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Drop-off? Hey, yeah.
Ooh. You're new here.
Megan. Randy.
Could you give me a hand? I'm all alone tonight.
translation.it: Puoi darmi una mano? Sono da solo stanotte.

translation.en: Sorry. I can't leave the premises.
translation.it: Scusa. Non posso lasciare la struttura.

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. Stickler on the rules.
translation.it: Sì. Già. Una che si attiene alle regole.

translation.en: But I'll tell you right now,
if you don't help me get this thing inside,
translation.it: ...che se non mi aiuti a portare questa cosa dentro...

translation.en: it's going to start to rot and decay. It's just going to blow up like a puffer fish.
translation.it: ...inizierà a marcire e a decomporsi. Si gonfierà come un pesce palla.

translation.en: And then we're both going to lose our jobs.
Unless...
What do you think? All right, okay. Fine.
Yeah? Yeah.
You're the best. My partner called in sick. Strep throat.
translation.it: Grandissima. Il mio collega s'è messo in malattia. Faringite.

translation.en: Which is 100 percent grade-A bullshit because--
translation.it: Che è al 100 percento una stronzata di primo livello...

translation.en: Do you want to grab that side? Yeah.
He is holing up with his psycho ex-girlfriend.
translation.it: S'è rintanato da quella pazza della sua ex.

translation.en: It seems like he should be making some new friends.
Yeah, I think he should probably pick a better psycho ex-girlfriend next time.
translation.it: Già, forse dovrebbe scegliersi una ex un po' meno pazza.

translation.en: So, I want to say thank you, by the way,
because the guy who used to have this job
translation.it: ...perché il tizio che faceva il tuo lavoro

translation.en: would never have just done that.
He was a prick. Horrendous breath.
translation.it: Era uno stronzo. Con un fiato orribile.

translation.en: How long have you been here? I just started.
translation.it: - Da quanto tempo sei qui? - Ho appena iniziato.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
MEGAN: What happened? RANDY: Oh, yeah, it's a bad one.
translation.it: - Cos'è successo? - Oh, questa è brutta.

translation.en: The cops found her in an alley. One, two, three.
translation.it: Gli sbirri l'hanno trovata in un vicolo. Uno, due, tre.

translation.en: [GRUNTING] Yeah.
Yeah, so the guy was still slicing her.
translation.it: Il tizio la stava ancora sgozzando.

translation.en: He took off. They still haven't found him.
translation.it: Se l'è svignata. Non l'hanno ancora trovato.

translation.en: Did they find out who he was? No clue.
translation.it: - Sanno chi è stato? - Nessun indizio.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what it said on her I.D.
translation.it: Già, è il nome che c'è sui documenti.

translation.en: I told you it was bad.
translation.it: Te l'avevo detto che era brutta.

translation.en: That's not even the insane thing. The insane thing is
translation.it: Non è neanche la parte peggiore. Quella peggiore è...

translation.en: they found chloroform by her body.
translation.it: ...che hanno trovato del cloroformio accanto al suo corpo.

translation.en: What kind of a lunatic drugs a girl, smashes her head in,
translation.it: Che genere di pazzo droga una ragazza, le spacca la testa...

translation.en: and then tries to burn her body after she's been dead?
translation.it: ...e prova a bruciarne il corpo dopo che è morta?

translation.en: I'll tell you who it is. It's someone trying to send a message.
translation.it: Te lo dico io chi. Uno che vuole mandare un messaggio.

translation.en: It could have been her pimp. It might have been a drug dealer.
translation.it: Forse il suo protettore. Potrebbe essere uno spacciatore.

translation.en: It could have been a sex thing.
Thanks, Randy. I can take it from here. You got it. Yeah.
translation.it: - Grazie, Randy. Da qui ci penso io. - Ricevuto.

translation.en: All right.
Thanks for the help, Megan.
Yeah.
COMPUTER: Intake bay. It gets easier. I promise.
translation.it: - Sala accettazioni. - Sarà più semplice. Promesso.

translation.en: Thanks.
It's all part of the job.
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
COMPUTER: Error.
Unable to load image.
What?
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
All right.
"Username."
Bye-bye, Megan.
Brown.
Get out of here.
You're losing your mind.
It's freaking hot.
Dave, you promised.
Oh, my God.
If you scream, I will have to slit your throat.
translation.it: Se urli, dovrò tagliarti la gola.

translation.en: Do you understand? Yes.
Do you understand?
Come on. MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
There's someone down here. Call the police now.
translation.it: C'è qualcuno qui. Chiamate la polizia.

translation.en: MAN: What? [PHONE SLAMS CRADLE]
MAN: "As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.it: "Come noi li rimettiamo ai nostri debitori.

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation,
translation.it: E non ci indurre in tentazione...

translation.en: but deliver us from evil."
Stop. Put the body down.
I've already called security. There's nowhere for you to go.
translation.it: Ho già chiamato la Sicurezza. Non puoi scappare.

translation.en: Now, just stay calm. You don't understand.
translation.it: - Ora stai calmo. - Tu non capisci.

translation.en: DAVE: Megan!
Get off of me! Get off of me!
Please, listen to me!
You've got to destroy her body. GUARD: Get him up!
translation.it: - Dovete bruciare il corpo. - Tiralo su!

translation.en: You're coming with us. Please, listen to me.
translation.it: - Vieni con noi. - Vi prego, ascoltatemi.

translation.en: MAN: Listen. Listen. GUARD: Are you okay?
You have to destroy her body. You've got to destroy her body.
translation.it: Dovete bruciare il corpo. Dovete bruciare il corpo.

translation.en: You don't know what you've done!
You don't know what you-- She's not dead!
translation.it: Non sapete cosa avete... Non è morta!

translation.en: DAVE: Stop.
Hello?
ANDREW [ON PHONE]: Megan, it's Andrew. I just heard what happened. Are you okay?
translation.it: Megan, sono Andrew. Ho sentito cos'è successo. Stai bene?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine, but I'm going to have to call you back.
translation.it: Sì, sto bene, ma ti richiamo dopo.

translation.en: Hey, can you open the door?
Hey. Are you okay?
Did that guy hurt you? No. No, not really.
translation.it: - Ti ha fatto male quel tizio? - No. Non proprio.

translation.en: [SIGHS] I'm fine. Do you want to call it a night?
translation.it: - Sto bene. - Vuoi andare a casa?

translation.en: I can find someone else to cover your shift.
I'm okay. Seriously, Lisa, I'm fine.
Nobody is going to hold it against you
translation.it: Nessuno te lo rinfaccerà, se vuoi andartene da qui.

translation.en: if you just want to get out of here.
translation.it: Nessuno te lo rinfaccerà, se vuoi andartene da qui. Lo so. Ma voglio restare. Okay? Posso farcela. Voglio farcela.

translation.en: I know. But I want to stay. Okay? I can do this. I want to do this.
translation.it: Lo so. Ma voglio restare. Okay? Posso farcela. Voglio farcela.

translation.en: But you don't have to. Lisa.
I need to do this.
What is it?
I know this is going to sound insane, but...
translation.it: So che ti sembrerà pazzesco, ma...

translation.en: I heard a corpse breathe.
Breathe? Yes.
Like...
an exhale.
Corpses expunge air sometimes when they're moved.
translation.it: I cadaveri talvolta espellono aria quando vengono mossi.

translation.en: Dr. Lewis didn't tell you this?
translation.it: Il dottor Lewis non te l'ha detto?

translation.en: In his defense, he...
probably assumed I was smart enough to know that corpses can't breathe.
translation.it: ...forse ha pensato che fossi intelligente abbastanza da sapere che non respirano.

translation.en: Are you hungry?
I can get us some take-out from the cafeteria.
translation.it: Posso prendere qualcosa da portar via al bar.

translation.en: Sure. Okay, come on.
You know, when that guy attacked me tonight...
translation.it: Sai, quando quel tizio mi ha aggredita stanotte...

translation.en: my first instinct wasn't to run.
You know, I wanted to defend myself,
to stop him.
I didn't freeze.
Why couldn't I have done that
when there was a gun pointed at my partner?
translation.it: ...quando hanno puntato una pistola al mio partner?

translation.en: And then none of this would have happened.
translation.it: Niente di tutto questo sarebbe successo.

translation.en: Look, it's just one step at a time.
translation.it: Senti, devi fare un passo alla volta.

translation.en: This job is the next step.
translation.it: Questo lavoro è il passo successivo.

translation.en: Hey. Hey.
There is a cop upstairs who wants to talk to you.
translation.it: C'è uno sbirro di sopra che vuole parlarti.

translation.en: I can cover down here if you want. Yeah. Yeah, okay.
translation.it: - Qui posso pensarci io, se vuoi. - Sì. Sì, okay.

translation.en: How's your arm? Oh, it's good as new.
translation.it: - Come va il braccio? - È come nuovo.

translation.en: Do you want some fries?
Sure. Thanks. LISA: Here. See you.
You didn't have to come here. They already have my statement.
translation.it: Non serviva che venissi. Hanno già la mia dichiarazione.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I was in the area.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. Ero in zona.

translation.en: Are you okay? He didn't hurt you?
Just my ego. Did you I.D. him yet?
translation.it: Solo il mio ego. L'avete identificato?

translation.en: No, he's not talking.
We'll know more once we get him to the station.
translation.it: Ne sapremo di più quando lo porteremo in centrale.

translation.en: You seem anxious.
Are you staying through the night?
That's the plan.
I just know how you get when you're stressed.
translation.it: So come diventi quando sei stressata.

translation.en: Okay, look, I appreciate you coming here,
translation.it: Okay, senti, apprezzo che tu sia venuto qui,

translation.en: but I've got things covered.
Is there something else?
I know this isn't the right time...
translation.it: So che non è il momento giusto...

translation.en: but when I picked up my stuff, there was something missing.
translation.it: ...ma quando sono venuto a prendere le mie cose, mancava una cosa.

translation.en: A bottle of Xanax.
And you're assuming that I...
what, stole them from you?
Did you? [SCOFFS] It's a valid question.
translation.it: L'hai fatto? È una domanda legittima.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be around
translation.it: Dovresti star lontana da farmaci di ogni sorta.

translation.en: controlled medications of any kind.
translation.it: Dovresti star lontana da farmaci di ogni sorta. Non trovi più il flacone e automaticamente pensi questo.

translation.en: You misplace a bottle of pills and automatically assume this.
translation.it: Non trovi più il flacone e automaticamente pensi questo.

translation.en: Why are you getting so defensive?
translation.it: - Perché sei così sulla difensiva? - Non lo sono.

translation.en: I'm not getting defensive. I'm getting pissed.
You know, it's as if you're completely incapable of giving me the benefit of the doubt.
translation.it: ...sembra che tu sia totalmente incapace di concedermi il beneficio del dubbio.

translation.en: If you ever need my help, I'm just a call away. Okay?
translation.it: Se mai avessi bisogno di me, basta che mi chiami. Okay?

translation.en: Actually, there is something you can help me with. I'll be right back.
translation.it: In realtà, c'è una cosa su cui potresti aiutarmi. Torno subito.

translation.en: Hey.
How's it going? I'm good. How are you?
translation.it: - Come va? - Bene. Tu come stai?

translation.en: I'll just be another minute if that's okay.
translation.it: Mi ci vuole un altro minuto.

translation.en: Yeah, no problem. Take your time.
translation.it: Sì, nessun problema. Fai con comodo.

translation.en: Bases loaded, three-and-two count, down by three.
translation.it: Basi occupate, tre palle e due strike, sotto di tre.

translation.en: The stakes could not be higher.
translation.it: La posta non potrebbe essere più alta.

translation.en: Here comes the pitch. It's a heater.
It's a grand slam!
Can you run these for me at the station?
The scanner broke down before I could run her prints.
translation.it: Lo scanner s'è rotto prima che potessi confrontarle.

translation.en: Her? Hannah Grace.
ANDREW: You already have her I.D.
I think that I.D. is fake. The picture on her license doesn't match.
translation.it: Credo che i documenti siano falsi. La foto sulla patente non è la sua.

translation.en: Her eye color, it's different.
translation.it: Il colore degli occhi è diverso.

translation.en: What? Once a cop...
Just get me the prints, okay?
You got it.
I mean, seriously.
Hello?
Dave, is that you?
Are you sure you gave me the right prints?
translation.it: Sicura di avermi dato le impronte giuste?

translation.en: Positive. The results are odd.
Why do you say that?
Because according to the prints, Hannah Grace has been dead for three months.
translation.it: Sulla base delle impronte, Hannah Grace è morta da tre mesi.

translation.en: It must be a glitch in the system. It wouldn't be the first time.
translation.it: Deve essere un errore del sistema. Non sarebbe la prima volta.

translation.en: Is everything else okay?
translation.it: Per il resto va tutto bene?

translation.en: Yeah, thanks.
Wait, what?
Hey, Dave, where the hell are you, man?
translation.it: Ehi, Dave, dove diavolo sei, bello?

translation.en: Is everything all right?
The security cameras downstairs... Yeah?
translation.it: - Le telecamere di sicurezza di sotto... - Sì?

translation.en: Can I access the morgue footage?
I can't leave the desk unmanned, but...
translation.it: Non posso lasciare la scrivania, ma...

translation.en: here you go.
Thanks.
[GASPS] Oh, my God.
Come on, Megan. Just breathe.
WOMAN [ON PA]: Lab Tech Hernandez, please dial 1-6-6-7.
Hey, can I talk to you for a sec?
Yeah. Excuse me.
So, I thought I saw someone in the bathroom.
translation.it: Allora, penso di aver visto qualcuno nel bagno.

translation.en: When I went to check the security footage,
translation.it: Quando sono andata a controllare i video...

translation.en: I mean, I could have sworn it was her.
Meg, who is "her"? What are you talking about?
translation.it: Meg, "lei" chi? Di cosa stai parlando?

translation.en: I need to show you something.
There.
What is that?
I don't know.
Well, I mean, it looks like a shadow. It's not a shadow.
translation.it: - Beh, insomma, sembra un'ombra. - Non è un'ombra.

translation.en: Look, when that guy broke in...
translation.it: Senti, quando è entrato quel tizio...

translation.en: he kept talking about the woman he killed...
translation.it: ...continuava a parlare della donna che ha ucciso...

translation.en: Hannah Grace, how she wasn't really dead.
translation.it: ...Hannah Grace, e di come non fosse realmente morta.

translation.en: I looked her up. She died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.it: L'ho cercata su Internet. È morta tre mesi fa durante un esorcismo.

translation.en: You know I don't believe in that kind of stuff, but...
translation.it: Lo sai che non credo a questo genere di cose, ma...

translation.en: ...this, to me, is not a shadow.
What is this?
Lisa, I didn't take any.
Are you lying to me? No, okay?
You need to believe me on this one.
I promise you, I didn't take any. I wanted to, but I didn't.
translation.it: Te lo giuro, non ne ho prese. Volevo, ma non l'ho fatto.

translation.en: I've just had them in my bag for comfort. I promise.
translation.it: Le tenevo nella mia borsa per sicurezza. Te lo giuro.

translation.en: Meg, do you...?
Do you remember when we were in meetings
and they started talking about coping mechanisms?
translation.it: ...quando hanno parlato di meccanismi di reazione?

translation.en: Yeah.
An addict's brain tries to find new ways to cope with stress.
translation.it: La mente di un tossico cerca di trovare modi nuovi per reagire allo stress.

translation.en: Everything that has happened to you today,
translation.it: Quello che ti è successo oggi...

translation.en: the stress that it has caused,
your brain is desperate to find a way to cope with it.
translation.it: ...la tua mente cerca disperatamente di trovare un modo di reagire.

translation.en: And it is going to do anything it can to convince you to use again.
translation.it: E farà di tutto per convincerti a drogarti di nuovo.

translation.en: My brain did not put a corpse on the security footage.
translation.it: Non è stata la mia mente a mettere un cadavere nei video.

translation.en: Look, I don't know what that thing is,
translation.it: Senti, non so cosa sia quella roba...

translation.en: but what I do know is you're jumping to the least plausible explanation.
translation.it: ...ma so che stai ricorrendo alla spiegazione meno plausibile.

translation.en: And right now you've got to focus.
So, don't see things that aren't there.
translation.it: Non vedere cose che non ci sono.

translation.en: Here. No.
Just take them. No.
I trust you.
Are you okay?
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
RANDY: I brought you a present.
Can you give me a hand again? Sorry. I can't help you out.
translation.it: - Puoi darmi di nuovo una mano? - Scusa. Non posso.

translation.en: Not after last time. What? Why? What happened?
translation.it: - Non dopo l'ultima volta. - Come? Perché? Cos'è successo?

translation.en: You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
translation.it: Non mi crederesti, se te lo dicessi.

translation.en: Okay. Well, try me.
MEGAN: So, it's obviously been a long night...
and I'm probably just remembering things wrong.
translation.it: ...e forse mi sto ricordano male le cose.

translation.en: She had a huge wound...
going down this side of her abdomen when you dropped her off. Correct?
translation.it: ...che correva di lato lungo l'addome quando l'hai scaricata. Giusto?

translation.en: Yeah, I could have sworn that she did.
So, where is it now?
And her arm was banged up too, right?
translation.it: Anche il braccio era malconcio, vero?

translation.en: Yeah. Have you checked the admittance photos?
translation.it: Sì. Hai controllato le foto di registro?

translation.en: The camera broke down and when I tried to scan her prints, the scanner died too.
translation.it: La macchina fotografica s'è rotta e anche lo scanner per le impronte.

translation.en: That's weird.
So, I had a friend run her prints at the police station.
translation.it: Così ho fatto controllare le impronte a un amico poliziotto.

translation.en: And?
Hannah Grace, she died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.it: Hannah Grace è morta tre mesi fa durante un esorcismo.

translation.en: Whoa. When that man broke in, he said she wasn't really dead,
translation.it: Il tizio che è entrato diceva che non era realmente morta...

translation.en: and now it's almost like she's healing herself.
translation.it: ...e adesso è quasi come se stesse guarendo da sola.

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
How personal?
Why are you working the night shift at a morgue?
translation.it: Perché fai il turno di notte all'obitorio?

translation.en: Because it's my job. No, no. You're smart and resourceful.
translation.it: - Perché è il mio lavoro. - No, no. Tu sei intelligente e ingegnosa.

translation.en: So, what happened?
You know what? Actually, it's not even-- I'm sorry. It's not my business.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Non sono neanche... Scusami. Non sono affari miei.

translation.en: [SIGHS] I had a rough patch a few years back and...
translation.it: Ho passato un periodo difficile qualche anno fa e...

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought I saw that in you.
translation.it: ...non lo so, ho pensato di vederlo anche in te.

translation.en: I'm sure that there is a rational explanation for all of this.
translation.it: Sono certo che ci sia una spiegazione razionale a tutto questo.

translation.en: You just-- Megan, you've got to be careful
translation.it: Tu... Megan, devi stare attenta a non diventare matta qui.

translation.en: that you don't drive yourself crazy here.
translation.it: Megan, devi stare attenta a non diventare matta qui.

translation.en: I know.
He's adorable.
I used to have a drinking problem.
And I would get drunk...
and lie and cheat and...
people told me that I was a dick sometimes.
translation.it: ...la gente mi diceva che ero stronzo a volte.

translation.en: All the time.
And then...
this guy shows up...
and he made me want to be a better person.
translation.it: ...e mi ha fatto voler diventare una persona migliore.

translation.en: So...
I quit drinking...
I quit lying...
and then I was finally able to be honest with the people that love me...
translation.it: ...e sono riuscito ad essere sincero con chi mi vuole bene...

translation.en: because I was finally able to be honest with myself.
translation.it: ...perché sono riuscito a essere sincero con me stesso.

translation.en: If you ever want to talk, I'm the guy.
translation.it: Se tu mai volessi parlare, sono qui.

translation.en: Thank you.
Have a good night. You, too. Get home safe.
translation.it: - Buonanotte. - Anche a te. Fai attenzione.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
Hey, I was just about to call you.
That bottle of Xanax that you were looking for...
translation.it: Quel flacone di Xanax che cercavi...

translation.en: I didn't take it.
Megan, you already told me this.
I found it in the medicine cabinet after you moved out.
translation.it: L'ho trovato nell'armadietto delle medicine dopo che te ne sei andato.

translation.en: And I should have packed it up with the rest of your things...
translation.it: Avrei dovuto impacchettarlo con tutte le altre tue cose...

translation.en: but I kept it.
I've just been feeling anxious lately...
and I felt safer knowing that they were there.
translation.it: ...e mi sentivo più tranquilla sapendo di averlo con me.

translation.en: You know, in case I needed them.
translation.it: Insomma, nel caso mi fosse servito.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
Because I'm tired of lying.
Anyway, I'll drop them off tomorrow morning if you're there.
translation.it: Insomma, te lo porto domani mattina, se ci sei.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be there. I'm glad you told me, okay?
translation.it: Sì, sono qui. Sono felice che tu me l'abbia detto.

translation.en: Me, too. Bye. Bye.
COMPUTER: Going down.
This is Randy, drop-off complete.
Goddamn it.
Hello?
Hello?
Oh, my God.
Megan, go to security right now.
translation.it: Vai subito dalla Sicurezza. Il tizio che è entrato in obitorio...

translation.en: The guy who broke into the morgue killed the two officers
translation.it: Vai subito dalla Sicurezza. Il tizio che è entrato in obitorio... ...ha ucciso i due agenti che lo portavano in centrale.

translation.en: transporting him to the station.
translation.it: ...ha ucciso i due agenti che lo portavano in centrale.

translation.en: We have an APB out on him, but there's a chance he could make--
translation.it: Abbiamo un mandato di cattura, ma se dovesse venire lì...

translation.en: Move. ANDREW: Megan?
Open it.
Get the lift.
Do you see what's happening to her body?
translation.it: Vedi cosa sta succedendo al suo corpo?

translation.en: She's healing.
She heals herself by killing people and then she rests.
translation.it: Si cura uccidendo le persone, e poi riposa.

translation.en: Why hasn't she killed you?
I don't know.
I believe you.
There's something evil hiding inside.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa di demoniaco nascosto dentro di lei.

translation.en: The church...
said to walk away...
but I couldn't give up on my only child.
translation.it: ...ma non potevo abbandonare la mia unica figlia.

translation.en: That's your daughter?
Not anymore.
Hannah struggled with depression...
anxiety.
It worked on her...
day after day...
till it broke her...
...found its way inside her body.
Is that when her eye changed?
translation.it: Per questo ha gli occhi di colore diverso?

translation.en: Yeah.
That's the demon's mark.
No matter how many exorcisms they performed, it stayed.
translation.it: Nonostante tutti gli esorcismi che le hanno fatto, è rimasto.

translation.en: One last...
...attempt.
In the name of God, in the name of Jesus Christ...
translation.it: In nome di Dio, in nome di Gesù Cristo...

translation.en: our Lord, be gone!
You have to understand...
...I did what I did...
translation.it: ...che ho fatto quello che ho fatto...

translation.en: ...to save the lives of others.
But the demon was too powerful.
translation.it: Ma il demonio era troppo forte.

translation.en: It stayed.
The next day, when we went to bury her...
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, siamo andati a seppellirla...

translation.en: ...her body, it disappeared from the mortuary.
Four people were dead.
We have to get her to the incinerator.
The knife wasn't enough.
The only way to destroy this thing is to burn her.
translation.it: L'unico modo per distruggere questa cosa, è bruciarla.

translation.en: Anything else just slows her down.
translation.it: Qualsiasi altra cosa la rallenta e basta.

translation.en: GRAINGER: No!
Come and get me!
No! Stop! [SCREAMING]
Stop!
Come on. Come on.
Come on.
Come on.
Come on!
COMPUTER: Mezzanine.
COMPUTER: Going up.
COMPUTER: Arrived at mezzanine.
Officer Kurtz, reporting a 10-65.
translation.it: Agente Kurtz, in riferimento a persona scomparsa.

translation.en: I need backup at Boston Metro Hospital, possible homicide.
translation.it: Servono rinforzi all'Ospedale Metropolitano, possibile omicidio.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
Fuck.
Who's there? It's Officer Kurtz.
translation.it: - Chi va là? - Sono l'agente Kurtz.

translation.en: Megan's friend. Where is she? Yeah, I don't know.
translation.it: - L'amico di Megan. Dov'è? - Già, non lo so.

translation.en: Dave's missing, too.
Everything's down. What's going on down here?
translation.it: Non c'è corrente. Che succede qui sotto?

translation.en: Oh, God.
ANDREW: Megan. Andrew. Oh, my God.
What happened? We have to get out of here.
[SCREECHING NOISE] ANDREW: What the hell is that?
Come on.
What? Oh, my God. Come on! Come on!
translation.it: - Che c'è? - Oh, mio Dio. Forza! Andiamo!

translation.en: Hey!
COMPUTER: Going down.
ERNIE: Megan!
Hey, stop!
MEGAN: No!
Let him go!
Andrew. Are you okay?
MEGAN: Okay, come on. Hurry. We don't have much time.
translation.it: Okay, andiamo. Presto. Non abbiamo molto tempo.

translation.en: Go get help. Wait. What? Megan.
translation.it: - Vai a chiedere aiuto. - Un momento. Cosa? Megan.

translation.en: No! Help me, please!
MEGAN: I'm 62 days clean...
...and I'm thankful for how far I've come.
translation.it: ...e sono grata di aver fatto tanta strada.

translation.en: It's not easy.
And I know I have a long way to go...
translation.it: E so che ne ho ancora tanta da fare...

translation.en: but I'm feeling stronger every day.
translation.it: ...ma ogni giorno che passa, mi sento più forte.

translation.en: Nothing's going to stop me now.
